page.title: 08CHESTERTON FARM
page.content: Chesterton Farm is a mixed arable farm of 600 acres,1.8km SW of Cirencester. There are about 230 cows kept and grazed on 10 fields.The cows are fed on sillage which is preserved grass and cow cake which is a mix of wheat, barley,soya bean and oil.Each year 150 calves are born,40 being kept the rest sold.Wheat and barley are grown as are potatoes.These are sold.The farm manager works from 7.30 am to 5pm or longer if necessary.The farm is highly mechanised.Only 1 man works full time. Two men do repairs part-time and 3 ladies work part-time in the shop.The tractors and other machines use some 50,000 litres of diesel fuel a year. The farm is busy all year round with milking and caring for the cows, planting (Autumn & Winter) spraying, fertilizing & cutting grass to make sillage.
